html:
11.12.24  4:10 pm   are apples an acceptable form of payment to shrimps?

      usually not

11.12.24  4:02 pm   i'm making a presentation in class about a musician. i decided to make it about you. anything you'd like to share with the class?

      i think the problem i was having was that i couldn't decide which thing to share with each class, so my solution was to put everything here on this site, so that the classes could each discover things at their own pace

11.12.24  4:00 pm   Hi bill! I'm graduating this year, but I'm struggling to come up with a senior quote. What do you think my senior quote should be?

      i want to suggest "i hope you are enjoying this yearbook so far", but the problem is i already suggested that one to everybody else

11.12.24  3:38 pm   thoughts on dutch people being the tallest in the world? 

      that's to make up for how low the lands are

11.12.24  3:09 pm   what is a genre 

      honestly i have no idea

11.12.24  12:30 pm   are you real, or are you a figment of my imagination? (pls be real plsplspslpsspslslls)

      i'm precisely as real as you. in fact the exact same. weird coincidence

11.12.24  11:15 am   my mood constantly and i mean CONSTANTLY goes way up and then way down and im not even in my teenage years anymore. will this even out as my frontal lobe develops

      hmmmm.......... i'm not sure. but surely this must have its advantages

11.12.24  11:09 am   i ask you to ask a possible question for this given answer:

water, bears, and electric cars

      'what are the first 3 items that come to your mind' specifically talking about your mind in this case, not mine

11.12.24  10:04 am   arent emotions wonderful 

      they're okay

11.12.24  9:24 am   Will you ever make a brave attempt to learn KOrean? 

      yes but first i might end up learning french, spanish, russian, mandarin chinese, and indonesian

11.12.24  8:41 am   I feel like the more I grow up, the more I settle into the belief that every person has their own subjunctive interpretation of every feeling. If you agree with me, can you think of something that's more or less universal that exists in all of the loves?

      the whole universe is universal, but is it even possible to put that into words

11.12.24  8:28 am   What do you think of accordions? 

      so crazy they just might work

11.12.24  7:56 am   Is there a difference between a #7 and a Maj7? 

      it's the same, but i think most people say maj7. check with your local community to see which way people are calling it

11.12.24  5:50 am   have you ever had to scrap a lyric and write a new one cuz the old one kinda sucked? how did you come up with one that didn't suck? 

      sometimes changes have to be made, but i don't look at it as only 'lyric' or only 'melody', etc. New words often mean different melody, and new melody usually means different words. the bigger question is, does it have to plug in to an already-written next part. that becomes a bit of a challenging stunt, which doesn't normally happen in the normal course of songwriting where each moment freely unpacks the next

11.12.24  1:53 am   how do i detach myself from the thoughts of creating for the sake of being able to say "i made this", rather than creating for myself or for the sake of creating. I always give up making stuff because i have premade conceptions of what its supposed to be, before i have even made anything, and cant even reach what i want. 

      like a lightning bolt in slow motion, (or maybe quick), you'll end up doing what you want to do

11.12.24  1:37 am   I listen to your music a lot (a lot) and I keep finding new things in it. It's very special to me. Thank you

      that sounds like good news

11.12.24  1:20 am   Thoughts on Ohio

      neither round, nor flat. very impressive

11.12.24  12:54 am   what should i draw if i only have nineteen minutes to draw it

      how about everything

11.12.24  12:44 am   does genre matter in music? i am having a genre crisis

      it seems to me that the strongest aspects of music are precisely the aspects that genre is incapable of describing

11.11.24  11:15 pm   I need to do more things. How do I start doing more things

      you need to figure out what the things are that you want to do, and why

11.11.24  11:11 pm   Thoughts on the number 11?

      it makes some cool looking refractions on base 10

11.11.24  10:47 pm   I just connected the dots that the grim reaper uses a scythe because he's the grim REAPER... and scythes are for farming and stuff... did everyone just know this?

      no, people who are not familiar with reaping may not know this. just as people not familiar with band wagons might not know that getting on the band wagon is a reference to band wagons

11.11.24  10:06 pm   do you like cookies

      yes

11.11.24  9:05 pm   you seem good at coming up with systems for yourself, and thinking creatively about how to do your work.  like the departments system you're using now, which most people wouldn't have ever thought to do, let alone actually committed to for months and months.

my question is, when you establish a system like that, do you feel a lot of resistance to it?  does it make you feel trapped?  and if so, what are some ways to alleviate that feeling and stay on track?

      it took a long long long long time before it made me feel trapped. in other words, it made me feel extremely extremely good and free for a long time before finally making me feel EVENTUALLY somewhat trapped. i think this is an indication of how good of an idea it is while also being bad

11.11.24  8:07 pm   what is your secret weapon for doing what you do

      let's be honest, secrets are ruined by telling them

11.11.24  6:52 pm   do you ever just want to sit down and look at the sun for a while, not doing anything in particular

      no, but what appeals to me more is looking at sunlight indirectly reflected off other things on earth

11.11.24  6:30 pm   how do I try to have fun while doing homework?

      try to understand the mindset of who created the assignment

11.11.24  4:41 pm   why does its gonna be alright go so hard, is there a scientific reason?

      i'm not sure

11.11.24  2:55 pm   Where does the phrase "To be frank..." come from?

      france

11.11.24  1:08 pm   people in wisconsin call traffic lights "stop and go lights" what is your opinion on this information

      that would be fine with me

11.11.24  12:06 pm   who taught you dutch?

      sander lantinga, coen swijnenberg, hoyte van hoytema, vasilis van gemert, mark labrand, mark "gezouten mening" van der moelen, eva jinek, gaMemeNeer, lucas rijneveld, michiel vos, wouter karssen, sylvanna simmons, gover meit, gerard ekdom, giel beelen, arjen lubach, mark rutte, wietz de jager, guido van rossum,.... nog keiveel andere mensen

11.11.24  11:30 am   how did you decide when it was time to release your stuff to the public? i'm thinking about doing the same, but I don't have a lot of experience, so there's a greater chance that my target audience finds it bad, and i heard it's hard to recover from a bad first impression. At the same time, if I decide to postpone until I'm "better", I'm not sure I will know how much better is good enough. Any tips to help me decide when?

      no, it can be hard to decide. i'm not totally convinved i've always done it right

11.11.24  8:49 am   Do you want to go gambling with me?

      not right now

11.11.24  7:23 am   how can i stop procrastinating

      first you have to identify what you aim to do

11.11.24  1:52 am   how do members of a jazz ensemble keep track of what chord is next, and next, and next

      forgive this corny analogy i always use, but it's really perfect here; it's the same way you keep track of your words while you're talking

11.11.24  12:11 am   you've mentioned that you sometimes change some aspects of the songwriting/producing/video-making process. what's one major change you've made to said process that has significantly influenced the quality of the songs/videos you produce?

      sometimes i try to do things better and it turns out worse

11.10.24  11:27 pm   do the saints go marching in?

      must have happened at least once before

11.10.24  10:59 pm   i went to the wedding of my sister's brother in law ate a lot of little pieces of shrimp went back to the airport thinkin bout how to find my train and there it is at terminal I1

      that makes sense. your story is very realistic

11.10.24  10:19 pm   can you win something you never participated in

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.10.24  10:15 pm   how do you do things without thinking too hard about them?

      maybe you can think wicked hard about one thing, and then you will tire yourself out so you'll think less about the next few things

11.10.24  9:52 pm   i feel like i'm too scared to show my stuff to the world & whenever i try to i just blank out, intensely question myself and then give up. as though i don't want to. finding myself in quite a dilemma here. do i just continue shunning my creations from the world, or what do i do?? 

      ultimately what you really want to do is what you will do. if you want to show it, you can. if you don't, you don't have to. it may take some time for all these feelings to weigh out

11.10.24  9:12 pm   mt st helens actually did blow up a year ago, thoughts?

      i don't believe you

11.10.24  9:12 pm   What is the universe made of? 

      you, and more

11.10.24  8:56 pm   why do you want to influence people?

      only if it's a good influence. if it's a bad influence then i'd say skip it

11.10.24  8:06 pm   how to get work experience by getting a job that requires work experience

      in that case someone would have to bend the rules

11.10.24  7:00 pm   what are your thoughts on traffic lights

      some people call them "stop lights" but i think that's not looking at the whole picture

11.10.24  6:59 pm   When given a question asking "Musical notation: yay or nay?", you responded "hay". In Spanish, hay means "there is" or "there are".

     that was one of the reasons i said that

      Unrelated, are you a horse?

     no

11.10.24  6:24 pm   i got pissed and broke a pen in half and now theres ink on the floor what do i do

      put the pen on the floor also

11.10.24  5:59 pm   my refrigerator has a question, kjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjdsfiuhsdfguydgfhdsjfgawjgejhfkghdfjgefknh cnhfcefnhycefhyfnhciuewcm

      why does that look so much like something hands would say, on a qwerty keyboard

11.10.24  4:58 pm   do you enjoy the mathematical constant known as pi

      yes
